title: 不让美国鬼子吃麻辣烫了！
contents:
[url=https://www.fxstreet.com/news/china-to-close-us-consulate-in-chengdu-retaliation-over-houston-scmp-202007230419][/url]https://www.scmp.com/news/china/diplomacy/article/3094336/us-consulate-chengdu-prime-target-china-retaliation-over

A source briefed on the matter said the US consulate in the southwestern city of Chengdu would be the target for China’s retaliation.
